pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wrapper for the concorde traveling salesman problem solver. The code was obtained from http://www.math.uwaterloo.ca/tsp/concorde/downloads/downloads.htm all rights of it go to the corresponding authors David Applegate, Robert Bixby, Vasek Chvatal and William Cook. The library doesn't give a specific license, but is provided free for academic research use, for further licensing options contact William Cook.
